text: @fred_guttenberg @kurtbardella The Corrupt Conservatives are. Look - school shootings - no gun laws; hiding the coronavirus for months, making people inWisconsin risk their life to vote (note it was a DEMOCRAT primary), now this. If anyone doesn’t see the writing on the wall, they deserve what they get.
